attributes.action: Stop the economic embargo on the Palestinian people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since January 2006 the UK has been boycotting the Palestinian government and by extension the Palestinian people.

Poverty has increased sharply with many doctors and teachers working without pay.

We agree with the House of Commons International Development Committee who say that the boycott could set back the Middle East peace process and lead to more violence.
